NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
University of Illinois
Hi Gregory Hall
March 31, l?5ii
nsr. George Probst
Mr0 Parker Wheatley
Mr, Bernard Buck
Jfr, Kenneth Wright
Mr. Harold Las swell
Dear Sir:
No doubt you will have noticed that we have been
appointed to the Radio Program Planning Committee by President
Graydon Ausinus.
Since we probably have little choice to serve individuÂ¬
ally and collectively to the best of our abilities, let us go
forward, I hope to meet with as many of you who may be at
the Columbus meeting early in April* If this hope does not
become a reality, I shall write you more extensively in mid-
April and plan on some future meeting date when time and funds
make it possible*
FES:js
